# 📱 Mobile App Usage - H1 2025

## 📊 Dots Radar Chart: Average Monthly Screen Time by App Category

```chart { "type": "dots-radar-chart", "title": "Average Screen Time by App Category (Jan–Jun 2025)", "description": "Dots radar chart showing average screen time per month (in hours) for popular app categories in H1 2025.", "dataKey": "hours", "color": "hsl(250, 65%, 50%)", "legend": false, "data": [ { "category": "Social Media", "hours": 52 }, { "category": "Streaming", "hours": 38 }, { "category": "Gaming", "hours": 45 }, { "category": "Productivity", "hours": 27 }, { "category": "Health & Fitness", "hours": 19 }, { "category": "News", "hours": 21 } ] } ```

---

## 🔍 Insight
- Social media apps dominated screen time in H1 2025, averaging **52 hours per month**.
- Gaming and streaming also remained strong, while productivity apps trailed behind.
